Different Crime.Crime Name: Judicial Review of Refugee Status Decision
legal_basis: sections 169(d), (e), and (f) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Rule 61(3) of the Refugee Protection Division Rules
procedural_fairness: IRB's decision lacked clarity and completeness
provided reasons were incomplete and unintelligible
decision_outcome: case is remanded to a differently constituted IRB panel for reconsideration
exclusion_reason: failure to address key issues like the Minister's argument under Article 1F(a)
review_standard: Federal Court reviewed the IRB's obligations and the adequacy of its decision
